full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN BSRUNG DBANG MO DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (ZHES BSTAN BSRUNG DBANG MO DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DGA' LDAN THUB LDAN RAB RGYAS GLING GI T'A BLA MA DAD BRTZON LDAN ZHING MKHYEN DPYOD RAB TU YANGS PA'I DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DGE SLONG RDO RJE 'DZIN PA'I THA SHAL BA, ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG DPAL LDAN LHA MOS 'BRAL MED RJES SU BZUNG STE BYANG CHUB SGRUB PA'I GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG ,)
